useCase.name: Deploy Cloudlet Service
useCase.trigger: actorName initiating deployment requests for cloudlet service.

mainSequence.step: A applies a deployment request for the cloudlet service using CLI's cloudlet-service-deploy() functionality.
CLI sends a deploy() message to the cloudlet service to initiate deployment.
A interacts with Web to deploy the cloudlet service through the service/deploy() function.
Web forwards requests for deploying the cloudlet service by using the service/deploy() call to S.
